title: FFWD rolls out wider, deep RYOT 77 Track tubular wheels at Six Days of Ghent
content:
Dutch wheelmaker FFWD has adapted their latest LAW Tech aero road wheels into an all-new wider RYOT 77 Track tubular wheelset for all-around velodrome racing. Set to debut under their Sport Vlaanderen-Balois riders today as the Six Days of Ghent track racing kicks off, the new 77mm deep wheels are quite a bit wider than

The post FFWD rolls out wider, deep RYOT 77 Track tubular wheels at Six Days of Ghent appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
